item.description:
Experience the glow of thousands of pumpkins, set in a magical display of artistry during this night-time Spectacular. Feast your eyes on thousands of carved and illuminated pumpkins, with hundreds of them depicting people, places and scenes from popular culture to old-time favorites and everything in between – all with painstaking detail and amazing intricacy! Don’t miss this unique, family friendly evening event, commended by the U.S. Library of Congress, featured by The Early Show, CNN and the Associated Press

http://www.rogerwilli...
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the entrance to the zoo.
item.name: Roger Williams Jack-o-Lantern Spectacular
